cause.description:
I believe that all animals deserve to have a fair chance in life without being killed for there fur or tusks or just for pleasure! I truely believe that it is up 2 us, the people of the world, to try and help the animals defend themselves!
1. Stop unnessisary killing (as in 4 pleasure)
2. Stop pouching!
3. Help the endangered species make a comeback
4. Try and pervent species now for becoming endangered!
5. To give animals a fighting chance!
cause.name: Stop The Unnessisary Killing of Innocent Animals!
